description:
This course will take anyone, even those with minimal experience, and show them how to set up their business email system and develop a professional looking website fast using easy to follow and simplified processes, best tools and solutions available, all without having to learn how to program.

Avoid the pitfalls and use best of breed, tried and tested methods from a professional with years of experience.

Save hours of time in launching your business and avoid significant development expenses by doing it yourself, without requiring any prior experience and no code required!

Learn how to:

  • Buy and configure your very own Domain Name
  • Create a scalable and secure email solution for your business that is set and forget
  • Learn how to configure you email on computer and mobile phones so you can access emails and calendars wherever you are
  • Setup dedicated website hosting that is fast, secure and cheaper than other shared hosting services and one that will also allow you to scale up as your business grows
  • Set up your very own clean, professional looking website and customise it for your business
  • Launch your website and start building sales leads and generting an income online
title: How to Build your Business Website and Email the fast way!
